Check result to see if logging possible
NOTE: Responsibility of child/sub Bots to:
NOTE: a) log Error/Exceptions to Error Log (via LOGINFO), and b) Take screenshots as required
NOTE: If Child/Sub Bots return Error/Exception via oStrStatus, value must be prefixed by cStrErrorMessagePrefix or cStrExceptionMessagePrefix
TODO: If sub needs to return multiple values, use pDictSubReturnValues
NOTE: In the framework, ERRORS differentiated from EXCEPTIONS.
NOTE: Exceptions are conditions explicitly checked (ex. via IF action)
NOTE: Errors occur when an Action in a Try fails, and control moves to the 'Catch'
NOTE: In general, we may be able to recover/proceed if an Exception occurs, but consider an 'Error' returned by a Child/Sub Bot to be fatal (Bot must exit)
NOTE: A child/sub Bot will return a blank oStrStatus if all successful; otherwise there was some error/exception.
Log to Error Log if MAIN threw Error/Exception (vs. from child/sub Bot)

variables.name: prompt-assignment
variables.description: A variable you can use for assignments

variables.name: pStrStatus
variables.description: Return value from a TaskBot.  Every TaskBot will return this status if successful, or an Error/Exception Event Code if an Error/Exception occurred.

variables.name: pStrProcessStartTime
variables.description: Start for execution of the process

variables.name: pStrEnvironment
variables.description: Control Room Environment associated with execution of process (ie. Dev, Test, Prod)

variables.name: pBoolUseEventConfig
variables.description: If true, an Excel-based Event Configuration will be used for the automation.

variables.name: pStrEmailConnectionType
variables.description: Email connection type to send email notifications.  EWS or Outlook.  For the former, passing username and password credentials is mandatory.

variables.name: pStrSMTPEmailServerHost
variables.description: SMTP server used for sending emails.

variables.name: pStrSMTPEmailServerPort
variables.description: Port for sending email via SMTP.

variables.name: pCredSendEmailUser
variables.description: User if sending email notification via SMTP or Exchange Web Services (EWS)

variables.name: pCredSendEmailPassword
variables.description: Password if sending email notification via SMTP or Exchange Web Services (EWS)

variables.name: pStrSMTPDefaultSenderEmailAddress
variables.description: Default sender email address when Bot sends emails.

variables.name: pStrDateTimeFormatTransactions
variables.description: Date format for logging transactions in log files (date and time with seconds)

variables.name: pStrDateTimeFormatScreenshots
variables.description: Date/time format for filesnames of screenshots.

variables.name: pStrDateTimeFormatLogFilename
variables.description: Date format for naming of log files (ex. AuditLog_yyyyMMdd.csv)
